message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly, it's the fairest way to start.
I'll take a bit more, considering the inflation
I'm willing to give you a bit more to avoid further inflation, let's work together to make sure we both get something.
Inflation is eating into my share, I need a better deal
We're both losing money with every round.  I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share to avoid further losses, but we need to come to an agreement soon.
Time is running out, I'm willing to take a bigger share to make up for inflation
Alice, we need to be realistic. With each round, the value of our shares diminishes.  This offer gives you more than your initial share, and ensures we both get a significant amount.
Inflation is killing me, I need a bigger share to break even

Alice, we are running out of time.  This offer gives you a share that will still be greater than what you would have received in the first round, adjusted for inflation. We need to agree now to avoid losing everything.
